sentences.en: Although the man was very old, he still moved with alacrity.
sentences.cn: 他虽然很老, 动作仍很敏捷.

sentences.en: As you can imagine, I accepted with alacrity.
sentences.cn: 你可以想象得到，我欣然接受了。

sentences.en: Cairncross accepted our offer with alacrity.
sentences.cn: 凯恩克罗斯欣然地接受了我们的建议.

sentences.en: He accepted her offer with alacrity.
sentences.cn: 他欣然接受了她的建议.

sentences.en: He accepted my invitation with alacrity.
He carved , and ate, and praised with delighted alacrity.
sentences.cn: 他边切边吃, 又兴致勃勃地赞不绝口.

sentences.en: He turns you adrift on the world with surprising alacrity.
sentences.cn: 他以令人惊奇的喜爱任你在世上漂泊.

sentences.en: Immediately he had finished tea he rose with alacrity to go out.
sentences.cn: 一吃完茶点,他就匆忙起身外出.

sentences.en: Mr. Rushworth stepped forward with alacrity to tell him the agreeable news.
sentences.cn: 罗什渥兹先生兴高采烈地向前来告诉他这个好消息.

sentences.en: Now, Cleanthes , said Philo , with an air of alacrity and triumph , mark the consequences.
sentences.cn: 菲洛以得胜的口吻欣然说道:那么, 克林提斯, 注意其后果吧.

sentences.en: Such books we read with resignation rather than with alacrity.
sentences.cn: 这样的书我们是无可奈何地而不是轻松愉快地去读的.

sentences.en: They accepted the offer with alacrity.
They fell on the sandwiches with alacrity.
sentences.cn: 他们快活地扑向三明治。

sentences.en: Tom gave up the brush with reluctance in his face, but alacrity in his heart.
sentences.cn: 汤姆把刷子让给本,脸上显示出不情愿, 可心里却美滋滋的.
